memberdef.type: int
memberdef.name: sign

detaileddescription.para: Note 0 case returns -1 instead of 0 Forced to check with small epsilon since we actually care about 0 being represented correctly as -1. It's ok if the 1.0e-10 doesn't return -1 or 1.
This is mostly so the simple test case have the correct behavior If it lands on the 1.0e-10 boundary the code reacts as if there was no hit
